thread.title: Mr Carl Warburton
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België évalué par Mr Carl Warburton

author: Mr Carl Warburton
title: Mr Carl Warburton
text: The flowers were delivered within 2 hours of me ordering them. They were so beautiful that everyone who saw them commented and the recipient felt very special. I would highly recommend these to anyone. I am in th uk and sent these to Brussels superb service
